original_text:
The eternal God is your dwelling place,
    and underneath are the everlasting arms.
And he thrust out the enemy before you
    and said, ‘Destroy.’
korean_text: 영원하신 하나님이 네 처소가 되시니 그의 영원하신 팔이 네 아래에 있도다 그가 네 앞에서 대적을 쫓으시며 멸하라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: The eternal God is your dwelling place,
and underneath are the everlasting arms.
And he thrust out the enemy before you
